DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate standardize , evidence-based protocol versus conventional approach dose oxytocin vaginal delivery .
DOC.brief_title: An Evidence Based Protocol Oxytocin Administration Vaginal Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: A traditional practice many US hospital include use 10-40 IU Oxytocin mix various volume crystalloid administer unspecified uncontrolled rate ( quite often pump ) order restore uterine tone minimize routine blood loss third stage labor . Many practitioner question high dose oxytocin regimen , time duration Oxytocin administration postpartum hemorrhage prophylaxis . Given lack universally accept , evidence base protocol , study aim compare efficacy traditional approach administration Oxytocin evidence-based design algorithm .
DOC.criteria: Vaginal Delivery Cesarean Delivery Allergy Oxytocin Cardiac Arrhythmia
